metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：水文气象观测网数据集（花寨子荒漠站自动气象站-2013）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Hydrometeorological observation network obtained from the automatic weather station (AWS) at the observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of Huazhaizi desert steppe station between 22 September, 2012, and 31 December, 2013. The site (100.319° E, 38.765° N) was located on a desert steppe surface in the Huazhaizi, which is near Zhangye city, Gansu Province. The elevation is 1731 m. There are two equipment in the site, and installed by Cold and Arid Regions Environmental and Engineering Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAREERI) and Beijing Normal University (BNU), respectively. The installation heights and orientations of BNU were as follows: two infrared temperature sensors (SI-111; 2.65 m, south, vertically downward), soil heat flux (HFP01; 3 duplicates, -0.06 m), soil temperature profile (AV-10T; 0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.2, -0.6, and -1 m), and soil moisture profile (ML2X; -0.04, -0.2 and -1 m). For the CAREERI installation: air temperature and humidity profile (HMP45C; 1, 1.99 and 2.99 m, north), wind speed profile (03102; 0.48, 0.98, 1.99 and 2.99 m, north), wind direction (03302; 4 m, north), air pressure (PTB210; in waterproof box), rain gauge (CTK-15PC; 0.7 m), four-component radiometer (CNR1; 2.5 m, south), soil temperature profile (107; -0.04, -0.1, -0.18, -0.26, -0.34, -0.42 and -0.5 m), and soil moisture profile (ML2X; -0.02, -0.1, -0.18, -0.26, -0.34, -0.42, -0.5, and -0.58 m, 3 duplicates in -0.02 m).
The observations included the following: 
(1)	infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, and Gs_3) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_60 cm and Ts_100 cm) (℃), and soil moisture (Ms_4 cm, Ms_20 cm and Ms_100 cm) (%).
(2)	air temperature and humidity (Ta_1 m, Ta_1.99 m and Ta_2.99 m; RH_1 m, RH_1.99 m and RH_2.99 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_0.48 m, Ws_0.98 m, Ws_1.99 m and Ws_2.99 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_4 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_4 cm, Ts_10 cm, Ts_18 cm, Ts_26 cm, Ts_34 cm, Ts_42 cm and Ts_50 cm) (℃), and soil moisture (Ms_2 cm_1, Ms_2 cm_2, Ms_2 cm_3, Ms_10 cm, Ms_18 cm, Ms_26 cm, Ms_34 cm, Ms_42 cm, Ms_50 cm and Ms_58 cm) (%, volumetric water content).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The BNU data were averaged over intervals of 10 min, The CAREERI data were averaged over intervals of 30 min. A total of 144 runs per day were recorded in BNU data and 48 records per day in CAREERI data. The BNU data during 30 June, 2013 and 26 July, 2013 were missing during the malfunction of datalogger. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2013-6-10 10:30. (6) Finally, the naming convention was AWS+ site no. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Li et al. (2013) (for hydrometeorological observation network or sites information), Liu et al. (2011) (for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2012年9月22日至2013年12月31日黑河水文气象观测网中游花寨子荒漠站气象要素观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市花寨子，下垫面是山前荒漠。观测点的经纬度是100.3186E, 38.7652N，海拔1731m。花寨子站中分别有北师大、寒旱所的观测仪器。其中北师大的观测仪器具体为：两个红外温度计安装在2.65m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、20cm、60cm、100cm处；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下4cm、20cm、100cm处；土壤热流板（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处。寒旱所的观测仪器具体为：风速传感器架设高度为0.48m、0.98m、1.99m、2.99m，共4层，朝向北侧；风向传感器架设在4m高处；空气温度、相对湿度传感器分别架设在1m、1.99m、2.99m，共3层，朝向北偏东侧；四分量辐射仪安装高度为2.5m，朝向正南；气压传感器放置于防水箱内；翻斗式雨量计安装高度为0.7m；土壤温度探头埋设在地下4cm、10cm、18cm、26cm、34cm、42cm和50cm处；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、10cm、18cm、26cm、34cm、42cm、50cm和58cm，其中2cm埋设3个重复。具体观测要素如下：
（1）北师大观测项目：地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_4cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_100cm）(单位：百分比)和土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_100cm）(单位：摄氏度)。
（2）花寨子寒旱所观测项目：风速（WS_0.48m、WS_0.98m、WS_1.99m、WS_2.99m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_4m）(单位：度)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor）(单位：瓦/平方米)、空气温湿度（Ta_1m、Ta_1.99m、Ta_2.99m、RH_1m、RH_1.99m、RH_2.99m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、土壤温度（Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_18cm、Ts_26cm、Ts_34cm、Ts_42cm、Ts_50cm）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm_1、Ms_2cm_2、Ms_2cm_3、Ms_10cm、Ms_18cm、Ms_26cm、Ms_34cm、Ms_42cm、Ms_50cm、Ms_58cm）(单位：体积含水量，百分比)。 
其中北师大观测要素为10min平均值，寒旱所的观测要素为30min平均值。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保北师大观测数据要素每天144个数据（每10min）；确保寒旱所观测要素每天48个数据（每30min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；在2013年6月30日-7月26日期间由于数据采集器问题导致数据间歇缺失；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2013-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称。
水文气象网或站点信息请参考Li et al. (2013)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al.(2011)。

background: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model was successfully applied to estimate evaporation (E), transpiration (T), and evapotranspiration (ET) for land covered with vegetation, which has significantly important applications for the terrestrial water cycle and water resource management. One-source evapotranspiration estimation models combine the soil–vegetation components into a single source. However, in real landscape conditions, the surface is heterogeneous and contains a mixture of soil and vegetation having different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. Therefore, one-source models explicitly cannot estimate the surface evapotranspiration accurately because the effect of.

Shuttleworth and Wallace proposed a typical two-source evapotranspiration estimation model in which the energy partition is assumed to occur in both “the above canopy” and “the under soil” cases. Water vapor and heat meet over the reference height in the interior of the canopy. Moreover, the mixed water vapor and heat can only exit through the top of the canopy; the total heat flux is in addition to the fluxes coming from every surface layer. However, the model is complex, having over five resistances that cannot be accurately calculated. In addition, the model includes required parameters and observations that cannot be readily obtained from operational satellite- and ground-based data; therefore, the range of applications of the model is limited.

The TSEB model has undergone several revisions, improving the estimation of soil and canopy net radiation, the aerodynamic resistance of the soil surface, the fractional vegetation coverage observed at the radiometer view angle, the distribution of regional-scale near-surface air temperature, and soil and canopy component temperatures. Because the TSEB model only requires the surface energy balance model with a single measurement of land surface temperature, the original model and subsequent refinements have been widely used to estimate E and T under a wide variety of vegetation types, vegetation coverage, climates, and spatial scales. However, most studies have only evaluated the total fluxes or ET (soil plus canopy) in comparison with measurements using the Bowen ratio–energy balance system, the eddy covariance (EC) system, or the large aperture scintillometer.

Accurately estimating surface fluxes in a strongly advective irrigated agricultural area is a particularly challenging task and is even more difficult when the EC flux measurements of H and LE have an incomplete energy balance closure with respect to the available energy Rn−G0. The previous sensitivity studies found that the TSEB model performance is mainly affected by the uncertainty in surface–air temperature difference. Sometimes, this difference is dominant due to the errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. In this letter, it is shown that there is an overestimation of the component temperatures compared with the observed composite radiometric. This often leads to the most crucial effect on the TSEB model performance. In addition, another factor is the strong advective environment in this region.
research objective: In this letter, the ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures were used to estimate E, T, and ET, which were better validated with observed ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes, and the ET measurements using an eddy covariance (EC) system.

The objective of this letter is to estimate E, T, and ET using the soil and canopy component temperatures observed via a high-resolution thermal camera as inputs to a series TSEB model and to subsequently better validate E, T, and ET using a combination of the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope technique and EC measurements.
challenges: However, the current composite temperature separation approaches are limited in their effectiveness in arid regions. Moreover, E and T are difficult to measure on the ground.

Errors in the derived component temperature were primarily caused by image classification errors; these classification errors varied with vegetation abundance. The higher uncertainty of H estimation is not only caused by the uncertainty of the TSEB model but also due to the increased uncertainty of the EC system, which is 18% when the mean H is small in the irrigated farmland. Due to image pixel classification errors, soil pixels were counted as vegetation pixels, which produced an overestimation of the canopy temperature under the developing vegetation abundance. Alternatively, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance could have produced the uncertainties in the estimated temperatures. In addition, the estimated uncertainty of the incoming short- and long-wave radiation transmittances through the canopy may be another source of Rn estimation errors.
methods: In this letter, the field observations were obtained from the Daman superstation installed in the central oasis, which is a 40-m boundary layer tower located at 100.3722° E, 38.8555° N and at an elevation of 1556 m. The meteorological parameters were measured every 10 min and included air temperature, wind speed, humidity at 5 m over the ground, four-component radiations (measured at 12 m above the ground using a four-component radiometer), and turbulent fluxes (measured at 4.5 m above the ground using an EC system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz). The soil heat fluxes were measured using three heat plates located 6 cm under the ground. A Fluke Ti55 thermal infrared camera was manually operated on a 25-m-high platform on a boundary layer tower to measure the thermal radiation of the cropland approximately every 120 min; the observations were collected as thermal images from approximately 07:00 to 19:00 China Standard Time (CST) during the daytime. The ground-based measurement data were applied to partition ET into E and T applying the Craig–Gordon model.

To evaluate the TSEB model accurately, the soil heat flux was using the ground measurement. In addition, the soil and canopy sensible heat fluxes were estimated using the series TSEB model, and their latent heat fluxes were calculated while solving the energy balance equations (1) and (2), respectively. The soil and canopy component temperatures were calculated using the images obtained with the thermal camera. To calculate the component temperatures, the visible and NIR images were classified into soil and canopy pixels using the maximum-likelihood method. Next, the soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures were exacted from the thermal images. Finally, the thermal infrared temperatures were converted to the radiation temperatures using the incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and the soil and canopy emissivities. Next, the simulated radiometric temperatures were validated against the surface radiometric temperatures, which were calculated according to the incoming long-wave radiation observed by the four-component radiometer.
dataset: The experimental area is an artificial oasis that is covered with maize, vegetables, and orchards. Data of day of year (DOY) 170, 173, 176, 192, 195, 231, 252, and 256 were used to determine ET and the ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) to ET during the Multi-Scale Observation Experiment on Evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces, which was part of the Heihe Water Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER-MUSOEXE).
findings: Our results indicated that even under the strongly advective conditions, the TSEB model produced reliable estimates of the E/ET% and T/ET% ratios and of ET. The mean bias and root-mean-square error (RMSE) of E/ET% were 1% and 2%, respectively, and the mean bias and RMSE of T/ET% were −1% and 2%, respectively. In addition, the model exhibited relatively reliable estimates in the latent heat flux, with mean bias and RMSE values of 31 and 61 W·m−2, respectively, compared with the measurements from the EC system. These results demonstrated that a robust soil and vegetation component temperature calculation was crucial for estimating E, T, and ET. Moreover, the separate validation of E/ET% and T/ET% provides a good prospect for TSEB model improvements.

Our results demonstrated that the TSEB model using soil and canopy component radiometric temperatures, which were obtained from a high-precision thermal infrared camera, can be applied in a strongly advection-irrigated agricultural area. Notably, the results illustrated that the latent fluxes of the soil and vegetation components were successfully separated with reasonable accuracy, as assessed using ground-based measurements. The estimated E/ET% and E/ET% values agreed well with the values observed using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes technique during the early, middle, and late growing seasons. In addition, the TSEB model produced reliable estimations of Rn, H, and LE; the mean biases of Rn, H, and LE were −18, 5, and 31 W ·m−2, respectively, and the RMSEs of Rn, H, and LE were 29, 19, and 61 W · m−2, respectively. This finding suggests that given accurate soil and vegetation component temperatures, E and T can be accurately separated from ET using the TSEB model.
backgroundCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型成功应用于估算植被覆盖土地的蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散发（ET），这对陆地水循环和水资源管理具有重要意义。单源蒸散发估算模型将土壤-植被组件合并为一个单一源。然而，在真实的景观条件下，表面是异质的，包含具有不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被的混合物。因此，单源模型显然无法准确估算表面蒸散发，因为其影响。

Shuttleworth和Wallace提出了一种典型的双源蒸散发估算模型，该模型假设能量分配发生在“树冠上方”和“土壤下方”两种情况。水蒸气和热量在树冠内部的参考高度相遇。此外，混合的水蒸气和热量只能通过树冠顶部排出；总热通量是除了来自每个表层的通量之外的额外通量。然而，该模型复杂，具有超过五个无法准确计算的阻力。此外，该模型还包括一些所需的参数和观测数据，这些数据无法从操作性卫星和地面数据中轻易获得；因此，该模型的应用范围受到限制。

TSEB模型经过多次修订，改善了土壤和冠层净辐射的估算、土壤表面的气动阻力、在辐射计视角下观察到的植被覆盖度、区域尺度近地面气温的分布以及土壤和冠层组分的温度。由于TSEB模型只需要一个地表温度的单一测量来进行表面能量平衡模型的计算，因此原始模型及其后续改进已广泛用于在各种植被类型、植被覆盖、气候和空间尺度下估算蒸散发（E）和温度（T）。然而，大多数研究仅评估了总通量或蒸散发（土壤加冠层），并与使用波文比-能量平衡系统、涡度协方差（EC）系统或大孔径闪烁仪的测量结果进行了比较。

在强烈对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是一项特别具有挑战性的任务，当EC通量测量的H和LE与可用能量Rn−G0之间存在能量平衡闭合不完整时，这一任务变得更加困难。之前的敏感性研究发现，TSEB模型的性能主要受到表面-空气温差不确定性的影响。有时，这种温差由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差而占主导地位。在这封信中，显示出与观察到的复合辐射温度相比，组分温度存在高估。这往往对TSEB模型的性能产生最关键的影响。此外，另一个因素是该地区强烈的对流环境。
research objectiveCn: 在这封信中，地面测量的土壤和冠层组分温度被用来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），这些估算通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及使用涡度协方差（EC）系统的ET测量结果进行了更好的验证，得到了E（E/ET%）和T（T/ET%）的观察比率。
这封信的目的是利用高分辨率热像仪观察到的土壤和冠层组件温度作为输入，通过一系列TSEB模型来估计蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），并随后结合稳定氧和氢同位素技术以及涡动相关（EC）测量来更好地验证E、T和ET。
challengesCn: 然而，目前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性有限。此外，E和T在地面上难以测量。

导出组件温度的误差主要是由于图像分类错误引起的，这些分类错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。H估计的不确定性不仅是由于TSEB模型的不确定性，还由于EC系统的不确定性，当灌溉农田的平均H较小时，这种不确定性为18%。由于图像像素分类错误，土壤像素被计算为植被像素，这导致在植被丰度发展的情况下，冠层温度的过高估计。另一方面，忽略大气向上辐射和透射率可能导致估计温度的不确定性。此外，估计的通过冠层的短波和长波辐射透射率的不确定性可能是Rn估计误差的另一个来源。
methodsCn: 在这封信中，现场观测数据来自于安装在中央绿洲的达曼超级站，该站是一座40米高的边界层塔，位于东经100.3722°，北纬38.8555°，海拔1556米。气象参数每10分钟测量一次，包括地面5米处的空气温度、风速、湿度，12米高处使用四分量辐射计测量的四分量辐射，以及使用10 Hz采样频率的涡度相关系统在4.5米高处测量的湍流通量。土壤热通量通过位于地下6厘米的三个热板进行测量。一台Fluke Ti55热红外相机在边界层塔的25米高平台上手动操作，约每120分钟测量一次农田的热辐射；观测数据在中国标准时间（CST）白天的07:00至19:00之间收集为热图像。基于地面测量数据，应用Craig-Gordon模型将蒸散发（ET）分解为蒸发（E）和蒸腾（T）。

为了准确评估TSEB模型，土壤热通量使用了地面测量数据。此外，土壤和冠层的显热通量是通过系列TSEB模型估算的，而它们的潜热通量则通过求解能量平衡方程（1）和（2）来计算。土壤和冠层的组件温度是使用热像仪获得的图像计算的。为了计算组件温度，使用最大似然法将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。接下来，从热图像中提取土壤和冠层的方向亮温。最后，利用来自天空的入射长波辐射和土壤及冠层的发射率，将热红外温度转换为辐射温度。最后，模拟的辐射温度与根据四分量辐射计观测的入射长波辐射计算的表面辐射温度进行了验证。
datasetCn: 实验区域是一个人工绿洲，种植有玉米、蔬菜和果园。使用了第170、173、176、192、195、231、252和256天的数据来确定蒸散发（ET）以及蒸发（E/ET%）和蒸腾（T/ET%）相对于ET的比率，这些数据是在多尺度蒸散发观测实验中获得的，该实验针对异质土地表面，属于黑河水联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER-MUSOEXE）的一部分。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，即使在强对流条件下，TSEB模型仍然能够可靠地估计E/ET%和T/ET%比率以及ET。E/ET%的平均偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）分别为1%和2%；而T/ET%的平均偏差和RMSE分别为−1%和2%。此外，该模型在潜热通量的估计上也表现出相对可靠的结果，与EC系统的测量值相比，平均偏差和RMSE值分别为31和61 W·m−2。这些结果表明，稳健的土壤和植被组件温度计算对于估计E、T和ET至关重要。此外，E/ET%和T/ET%的单独验证为TSEB模型的改进提供了良好的前景。

我们的结果表明，使用高精度热红外相机获得的土壤和冠层组件辐射温度的TSEB模型可以应用于强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。值得注意的是，结果表明土壤和植被组件的潜在通量成功地以合理的精度分离，经过地面测量的评估。估计的E/ET%和E/ET%值与在早期、中期和晚期生长季节使用稳定氧和氢同位素技术观察到的值很好地一致。此外，TSEB模型对Rn、H和LE的估计也很可靠；Rn、H和LE的平均偏差分别为−18、5和31 W·m−2，Rn、H和LE的均方根误差（RMSE）分别为29、19和61 W·m−2。这一发现表明，给定准确的土壤和植被组件温度，E和T可以通过TSEB模型准确地从ET中分离出来。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 在异质表面上生态水文过程的上升尺度是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的阻碍。HiWATER实验旨在通过在分层嵌套尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而解决这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为了捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层次嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个EC塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区大约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被先前研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们展示了一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，涵盖了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也记录了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量干旱农业地区土壤和树冠组件温度的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to measure soil and canopy component temperatures in an arid agricultural area involves the use of a high-resolution thermal camera. The thermal infrared camera is manually operated from a high platform to capture thermal images of the cropland, which are then used to calculate the soil and canopy component temperatures.
Example.AnswerCn: 在干旱农业地区，测量土壤和冠层成分温度的一种数据收集方法是使用高分辨率热像仪。热红外相机从高处平台手动操作，以捕捉农田的热图像，然后用这些图像计算土壤和冠层成分的温度。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in the collection of multiscale eco-hydrological data in oasis-desert areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区收集多尺度生态水文数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge in collecting multiscale eco-hydrological data in oasis-desert areas is the poor availability of multiscale observations, which can hinder the progress in understanding and upscaling eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface.
Example.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区收集多尺度生态水文数据的一个挑战是多尺度观测的可用性差，这可能会阻碍我们理解和提升异质表面上生态水文过程的进展。

Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is the one collected from the Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) project. This dataset includes energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, along with auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters, observed from 2012 to 2021 in the middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin.

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'energy balance closure' refer to in the context of hydrometeorological data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在水文气象数据收集的背景下，“能量平衡闭合”指的是能量输入和输出之间的平衡状态。
Definition.AnswerEn: Energy balance closure refers to the requirement that the sum of the energy inputs and outputs in a system should be equal. In hydrometeorological data collection, achieving energy balance closure is crucial for validating the accuracy of measured energy fluxes, such as sensible and latent heat fluxes, compared to the available energy (net radiation minus ground heat flux). Ensuring energy balance closure indicates that all major energy exchanges have been accurately accounted for in the measurements.
Definition.AnswerCn: 能量平衡闭合是指系统中能量输入和输出的总和应相等。在水文气象数据收集过程中，实现能量平衡闭合对于验证测量的能量通量（如显热通量和潜热通量）与可用能量（净辐射减去地面热通量）之间的准确性至关重要。确保能量平衡闭合表明所有主要的能量交换在测量中都得到了准确的考虑。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods used in the 黑河生态水文遥感试验 dataset compare to those used in the HiWATER experiment for observing eco-hydrological processes?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验数据集使用的数据收集方法与HiWATER实验在观察生态水文过程方面的使用方法有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The 黑河生态水文遥感试验 dataset utilizes a network of automatic meteorological stations with various instruments to measure meteorological and soil parameters at different heights and depths, providing 10-minute and 30-minute average data. In contrast, the HiWATER experiment employs a hierarchical array of observation systems, including eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations, to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes with a focus on multiscale observations and intensive airborne remote sensing missions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验数据集利用一网络自动气象站，配备各种仪器以测量不同高度和深度的气象和土壤参数，提供10分钟和30分钟的平均数据。相比之下，HiWATER实验采用分层观测系统，包括涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站，以捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，重点关注多尺度观测和密集的航空遥感任务。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with data collection in oasis-desert systems, and how can these affect the interpretation of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，数据收集面临哪些挑战，这些挑战如何影响能量、水蒸气和碳交换过程的解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in data collection in oasis-desert systems include ecological environment degradation, such as drying rivers and lakes, vegetation degradation, and dust storms. These challenges can complicate the interpretation of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes, as they introduce variability and uncertainty in observational data, potentially impacting the accuracy and reliability of assessments regarding the stability and productivity of these systems.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，数据收集面临的挑战包括生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化以及沙尘暴。这些挑战可能会使能量、水蒸气和碳交换过程的解释变得复杂，因为它们引入了观测数据的变异性和不确定性，可能影响对这些系统稳定性和生产力评估的准确性和可靠性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can field observations and remote sensing data be integrated to improve the accuracy of evapotranspiration estimates in heterogenous land surfaces?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在异质土地表面中，如何将实地观察和遥感数据结合起来，以提高蒸散发估算的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Field observations and remote sensing data can be integrated to improve the accuracy of evapotranspiration estimates by using ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures, along with high-resolution thermal camera inputs, in models like the TSEB. This integration allows for the validation and refinement of estimates using additional techniques, such as stable isotope analysis and eddy covariance measurements, providing a more comprehensive and accurate representation of evapotranspiration processes over heterogeneous land surfaces.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 现场观测和遥感数据可以结合起来，提高蒸散发估算的准确性，方法是利用地面测量的土壤和冠层组分温度，以及高分辨率热像仪输入，在像TSEB这样的模型中进行整合。这种整合允许使用额外的技术，如稳定同位素分析和涡度协方差测量，对估算进行验证和精细化，从而提供对异质土地表面蒸散发过程的更全面和准确的表征。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges of accurately estimating surface fluxes in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在强烈对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量的挑战因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Factors contributing to the challenges of accurately estimating surface fluxes in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas include the uncertainty in surface-air temperature difference, errors in determining surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature, classification errors in image pixel classification where soil pixels are counted as vegetation pixels, and ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在强对流灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量面临的挑战因素包括：表面-空气温度差的不确定性、从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差、图像像素分类中的分类错误（将土壤像素计入植被像素），以及忽略大气上行辐射和透射率。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the causes behind the challenges faced by inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas, such as ecological environment degradation?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 内陆河流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临的挑战背后的原因是什么，例如生态环境退化？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges faced by inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas, such as ecological environment degradation, are caused by factors like the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent occurrence of dust storms. These issues are exacerbated by climate change and human activities, especially in river basins along the Silk Road.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临的挑战，如生态环境退化，主要是由于河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁发生的沙尘暴等因素造成的。这些问题因气候变化和人类活动而加剧，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的河流流域。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of employing a two-source energy balance model versus a one-source model in estimating evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在估算异质景观中的蒸散发时，采用双源能量平衡模型与单源模型的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The two-source energy balance model provides more accurate estimates of evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration in landscapes with mixed soil and vegetation because it accounts for different temperatures and resistances to energy exchange of soil and canopy components. This leads to more reliable estimates of energy partitioning, especially in complex environments, compared to one-source models that oversimplify these interactions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 双源能量平衡模型在混合土壤和植被的景观中提供了更准确的蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散发估计，因为它考虑了土壤和冠层组件的不同温度和能量交换阻力。这导致了更可靠的能量分配估计，特别是在复杂环境中，相比于简化这些相互作用的一源模型。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of establishing a multiscale observation system in oasis-desert ecosystems for eco-hydrological studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中建立多尺度观测系统的主要目标是什么？用于生态水文研究。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives are to address the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces and to provide quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange. This understanding is crucial for maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems, achieving sustainable development, and supporting ecological security in the oasis-desert area.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是解决在异质表面上提升生态水文过程的挑战，并提供对能量、水蒸气和碳交换的定量理解。这种理解对于维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡、实现可持续发展以及支持绿洲-沙漠地区的生态安全至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended outcomes of implementing a comprehensive data quality control process in hydrometeorological and flux measurement datasets?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在水文气象和通量测量数据集实施全面的数据质量控制过程的预期结果是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended outcomes include ensuring the accuracy and reliability of the datasets, which are essential for analyzing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes. Quality control involves sensor calibration, data processing, and data archiving, which collectively enhance the usability of the datasets for research and support informed decision-making in ecological and hydrological management of oasis-desert systems.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 预期结果包括确保数据集的准确性和可靠性，这对于分析能量、水蒸气和碳交换过程至关重要。质量控制涉及传感器校准、数据处理和数据归档，这些共同提高了数据集在研究中的可用性，并支持在绿洲-沙漠系统的生态和水文管理中的知情决策。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are ground-based measurements used to partition evapotranspiration into evaporation and transpiration in heterogeneous landscapes?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 地面测量如何用于在异质景观中将蒸散发分为蒸发和植物蒸腾？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Ground-based measurements, including soil and canopy component temperatures, are applied to partition evapotranspiration into evaporation and transpiration by using models like the Craig–Gordon model and validating with techniques like stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes and eddy covariance measurements.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 地面测量，包括土壤和树冠组件温度，被用于通过使用像Craig-Gordon模型这样的模型将蒸散发分为蒸发和蒸腾，并通过稳定氧和氢同位素技术以及涡度协方差测量进行验证。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What is the methodology for capturing multi-scale eco-hydrological processes using remote sensing and ground measurements in oasis-desert interactions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 捕捉绿洲-沙漠相互作用中的多尺度生态水文过程的遥感和地面测量方法是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The methodology involves using a hierarchically nested scale of instrumentation including eddy covariance towers, automatic meteorological stations, and remote sensing tools like LiDAR and thermal imagers to capture multi-scale data. Intensive observations and airborne remote sensing missions complement ground measurements to obtain comprehensive data on eco-hydrological processes.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该方法涉及使用分层嵌套的仪器规模，包括涡度协方差塔、自动气象站以及激光雷达和热成像仪等遥感工具，以捕获多尺度数据。密集的观测和空中遥感任务补充了地面测量，以获取生态水文过程的综合数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What techniques enable the effective separation of soil and canopy component temperatures in heterogeneous landscapes for evapotranspiration estimation?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术能够有效分离异质景观中土壤和冠层成分的温度，以便进行蒸散发估算？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The separation of soil and canopy component temperatures in heterogeneous landscapes is enabled by using high-resolution thermal cameras to capture thermal images, which are then processed using the maximum-likelihood method to classify visible and NIR images into soil and canopy pixels. The thermal infrared temperatures are converted to radiation temperatures using incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and soil and canopy emissivities.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在异质景观中，通过使用高分辨率热像仪捕捉热图像，从而实现土壤和冠层组件温度的分离。这些热图像随后使用最大似然法进行处理，将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。热红外温度通过来自天空的入射长波辐射以及土壤和冠层的发射率转换为辐射温度。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data processing and quality control procedures enable the generation of reliable datasets for analyzing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据处理和质量控制程序能够生成可靠的数据集，以分析干旱地区的能量、水蒸气和碳交换？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Reliable datasets for analyzing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange are enabled by comprehensive data processing and quality control procedures that include sensor calibration, data collection, processing, and archiving. These procedures ensure that observational data from eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and weather stations are carefully managed and quality controlled.

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways can the current datasets from the Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) be expanded or refined to better support future eco-hydrological studies?

Additionally, integrating socio-economic data could provide a more comprehensive understanding of the interactions between human activities and eco-hydrological processes in the area.

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential strategies for expanding datasets related to evapotranspiration estimation models in arid agricultural areas.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 探索与干旱农业地区蒸散发估算模型相关的数据集扩展的潜在策略。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Expanding datasets for evapotranspiration estimation models in arid agricultural areas can involve integrating ground-based measurements with high-resolution thermal imaging and remote sensing data. Key strategies include using stable isotope techniques, thermal cameras for soil and canopy temperature measurements, and applying models like the two-source energy balance (TSEB) model. Conducting experiments in various conditions, such as strongly advective environments, and collecting data at different growth stages can also enhance dataset comprehensiveness and accuracy.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在干旱农业地区，扩展蒸散发估算模型的数据集可以通过将地面测量与高分辨率热成像和遥感数据相结合来实现。关键策略包括使用稳定同位素技术、热像仪进行土壤和冠层温度测量，以及应用如双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型等模型。在不同条件下进行实验，例如强烈的平流环境，并在不同生长阶段收集数据，也可以增强数据集的全面性和准确性。
